name: VNDetectRectanglesRequest
desc: An image analysis request that finds projected rectangular regions in an image.

items.name: var minimumAspectRatio: VNAspectRatio
items.desc: A float specifying the minimum aspect ratio of the rectangle to detect, defined as the shorter dimension over the longer dimension.

items.name: var maximumAspectRatio: VNAspectRatio
items.desc: A float specifying the maximum aspect ratio of the rectangle to detect, defined as the shorter dimension over the longer dimension.

items.name: typealias VNAspectRatio
items.desc: A type alias for expressing rectangle aspect ratios in Vision.

items.name: var quadratureTolerance: VNDegrees
items.desc: A float specifying the number of degrees a rectangle corner angle can deviate from 90Â°.

items.name: typealias VNDegrees
items.desc: A typealias for expressing tolerance angles in Vision.

items.name: var minimumSize: Float
items.desc: The minimum size of a rectangle to detect, as a proportion of the smallest dimension.

items.name: var minimumConfidence: VNConfidence
items.desc: A value specifying the minimum acceptable confidence level.

items.name: typealias VNConfidence
items.desc: A type alias for the confidence value of an observation.

items.name: var maximumObservations: Int
items.desc: An integer specifying the maximum number of rectangles Vision returns.

items.name: var results: [VNRectangleObservation]?
items.desc: The results of the request to detect rectangles.

items.name: class VNRectangleObservation
items.desc: An object that represents the four vertices of a detected rectangle.
